sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This page provides a way how to simulate the spin qubit dynamics with the CCEX software. The source code of this software can be found in "CCEX GitHub Repository"

sect1.title: About the simulation
sect1.para: In this code, we simulate the qubit dynamics in the presence of the bath spins.

You can simulate the spin qubit dynamcis with the following methods:
Cluster correlation expension method (CCE method)
CCE-NeNn method
Generalized CCE method
Partition CCE method (To be done)

You can obtain the following physical quantities of qubit for evolving time:
Coherence function
Density matrix (gCCE method only)
Noise function (To be done for CCE, gCCE)

sect1.title: Usage Instructions
sect1.para: To run the code using mpirun , use the following command :

listitem.para: process_number : The number of processes to run.
code_path : The path to your executable code.
-f input_file : The input file required for the code to run. (input file should be .json file)

sect1.para: * For more detailed instructions, see the Getting Started.
